Circular Tech Pioneers Network

Privacy Policy

As a visitor to this website (no cookies!)

The privacy of our website visitors is important to us so we do not track any individual people. As a visitor to the this website:

  • No personal information is collected
  • No information such as cookies is stored in the browser
  • No information is shared with, sent to or sold to third-parties
  • No information is shared with advertising companies
  • No information is mined and harvested for personal and behavioral trends
  • No information is monetized
We run a Plausible Analytics script to collect some anonymous usage data for statistical purposes. The goal is to track overall trends in our website traffic, it is not to track individual visitors. All the data is in aggregate only. No personal data is collected.

Applying or joining the community

When you apply or join we collect and process the following information: Personal identifiers, contacts and characteristics (for example, name and contact details)

We collect only what we need and we will solely process this information to communicate with you about the community. We do not share, sell or use your information for any other purpose.

We currently use Google Forms to collect this information, the information is shared in a private Google document. You can ask us to delete your information at any time, using the email address below.

Contact
  • The Circular Tech Pioneers Network is sponsored by HappyPorch.com
  • contact@circularpioneers.tech

Supported by HappyPorch.com.

©2024 Privacy Policy
